name: Boba Fett, Relentless Bounty Hunter
Lore: 'Boba Fett''s helmet has infrared capabilities, a motion tracking system, a macrobinocular viewer, an internal comlink and a broadband antenna. He doesn''t miss a thing.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May ''fly'' (landspeed = 3).  While armed with a blaster, may add one destiny to total power or attrition.  During your move phase, if escorting a captive, may use 2 Force to relocate both to a docking bay.  Immune to attrition < 3.',
